HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: The delivery amount varies for different products and can be seen in the detailed product description. If there are multiple products in the order, only the most expensive delivery amount for one product from the cart is charged. The delivery is automatically included in the price when creating the order.

express_delivery.pricing: 50% increase on the standard delivery price

HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Delivery to some islands is made to the nearest post office. Delivery may take longer according to the delivery schedule for those locations.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: The delivery price is charged per item for white goods and televisions. For multiple items, the most expensive delivery is charged in full, and for each subsequent item, the delivery price is reduced by 50%. An additional 'carry-in' service is available for a fee in Zagreb, Split, Poreč, and Pula areas, with prices ranging from 7 to 40 EUR depending on the weight and floor.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: up to 10 business days for CARGO pallet shipments
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Delivery to some islands is made to the nearest post office.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers home delivery throughout Croatia and free in-store pickup. There is no mention of parcel shop or parcel locker delivery. PROVIDERS: Deliveries are handled by GLS and Hrvatska pošta (Paket 24). PRICING: Standard delivery cost is variable and shown on product pages. For orders with multiple items, only the highest single delivery fee is charged. In-store pickup is free. RESTRICTIONS: Delivery to some islands is restricted to the nearest post office. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: An express 24-hour delivery option is available for a 50% surcharge. For bulky items, a special 'carry-in' service is offered for an additional fee in the areas of Zagreb, Split, Poreč, and Pula. Cash on delivery is an available payment option, with no surcharge mentioned. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is available on a dedicated page and is relatively clear. The main drawback is the lack of a general price list, as costs are only visible per product. Information on island delivery could be more specific about which locations are affected by restrictions.
